DOC.brief_summary: Background : The reactive hyperemia-peripheral artery tonometry ( RH-PAT ) newly develop method noninvasive endothelial function assessment . Objective : The goal study determine whether significant difference RH-PAT score present adolescent type 1 diabetes ( T1D ) comparison control . We also compare RH-PAT score obese adolescent versus control .
DOC.brief_title: Peripheral Artery Tonometry Children With Type 1 Diabetes Obese Children
DOC.criteria: 1219 year age type 2 diabetes ; obesity group type 1 diabetes
